greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number of ways to color cells of an n X n square with 2 colors so that no subsquare of side > 1 has all corners same color.
comment: There is no solution for a 15 X 15 (or larger) square. - _Sean A. Irvine_, Feb 13 2019
link: R. Bacher and S. Eliahou, Extremal binary matrices without constant 2-squares (see p. 11).
R. Bacher and S. Eliahou, Extremal binary matrices without constant 2-squares, The Electronic Journal of Combinatorics, Open Journal Systems, 2010, 1 (1), pp.77-100. See p. 87.
results.author: _David W. Wilson_
ext: More terms from Bacher and Eliahou paper added by _Sean A. Irvine_, Feb 13 2019
